Player History
Drafted in 31st round, 489th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Traded from Philadelphia to San Francisco on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: LF Donald Lamberth, 3B Asa Kelemen, RF Fred Bondurant. Going to PHI: RF Manuel Cambra)...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 1/31/2018 (Going to SF: RF Filiberto Tomas, 3B Gaby Realego, P Kevin Nelson, P Edward Lawhon. Going to CIN: P Philip Finklea, P Alberto Fresno, P Rober
to Ortiz, 2B Estanis Aguilar, RF Fred Bondurant)...
Injured on 5/25/2018 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/24/2018 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/4/2019, off Ryan Loya (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/2019, off Alfonso Rodriguez (MON)...
Injured on 10/20/2019 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 2/25/2020 (Going to CIN: P Albert Clothier. Going to STL: RF Fred Bondurant)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2020, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 6/27/2020 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/2021 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 5/19/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2022, hitting .619 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2022, hitting .333 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,921,429 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 4/16/2023...
Injured on 5/16/2023 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
